subject: Hi all
author: ourobouros2k2
full_text:
Decided to drop by and say hello. Up front I am skeptical of box 
related ITC, however, that being said I am also very curious. It would 
be hard to argue contextually accurate results, regardless of methods 
used. I am looking forward to putting my new shack-hack to use, and 
will keep everyone updated :)

Btw, my name is Andy, 30 something, live in Oklahoma, and look forward 
to a great wealth of info from this group. I have a lot of info here to 
digest, so off I go.

regards,
Andy
